channel.title: Can someone explain how clients work?
channel.description:
How do they work? How does the client decrypt the cache files, and display it on the screen? What is to stop us from getting cache from Arcanists, and making private servers out of it? What else is required to make them run?
Thanks

item.title: Can someone explain how clients work?
item.dc:creator: @doom_j doom_j
item.description:
@doom_j wrote:

easy break down

Client sends data to server, server sends data back to client, client sends new data that the server requests, server sends data client requests, server and client send 1’s and 0’s.

Read full topic
item.source: Can someone explain how clients work?

item.title: Can someone explain how clients work?
item.dc:creator: @Vain1 Vain_
item.description:
@Vain1 wrote:

i know enigma / silab / david all worked on making a working deob. davidi2 got it working / some refactored and then gave up and lost code because everyone seems to think it would be a waste of time when the game only died because the code wasn’t maintained or updated.

i attempted the same project and got the client from the cache/deobbed but never fixed all the errors as i was in over my head.

i feel as though this could easily be done in a matter of days if the people with the knowledge took the time to do it. and if anyone ever got the cache format down - the world would be so much better. its an amazing game and its so fun to play / a private server would be extremely cool with the amount of physics already in the client - theres no stopping what type of gameplay/matches/spells could be added!

tho - nothing is stopping anyone from doing it - it is a dead game. people with knowledge dont want to bother because it isn’t quite so simple.

cache -> pack200 -> client -> deob -> fix errors -> modify loader -> understand/refactor login -> write server

Read full topic
item.source: Can someone explain how clients work?

item.title: Can someone explain how clients work?
item.dc:creator: @HcoJustin HcoJustin
item.description:
@HcoJustin wrote:

[quote=“TiVo, post:7, topic:547853”][quote author=AtomicInt_ link=topic=666759.msg4458124#msg4458124 date=1416086761]

How do they work? How does the client decrypt the cache files, and display it on the screen? What is to stop us from getting cache from Arcanists, and making private servers out of it? What else is required to make them run?

Thanks

Nothing is stopping anyone from making an Anacarist private server, we have no reason to. There is no market or interest.
[/quote]

What I mean is, what is the process required to decrypt the cache, and make a client frmo the cache? Is there any documentation for this process?[/quote]
Nope, it just requires lots of reverse engineering. There is no specific documentation for Jagex products alone, you have to take the general principles and apply them to whatever you want.

Read full topic
item.source: Can someone explain how clients work?
